Summary: Looked like a helicopter without blades had a solid red light on the nose and engulfied in flames
divs: Sighting DetailsOutside having a smoke on the phone with roommate that was at work. I looked up at the sky and saw what looked like a helicopter that was on fire it was moving in a straight like but the helicopter thing was angled toward me as the entire thing moved at an angle in a straight line. Hard to explain I figured somebody else would know apparently people all over the world seen fireball like ufo's that night. It was low enough that It looked like a police helicopter looking for somebody but there was no light oh beam shining down from it. That's all I could see or remember nothing on the news about a helicopter crash or anything like that in my area I just thought it was weird. It moved towards downtown Columbus away from my neighbor hood. Didn't seem to stop or poke around at anything at all.
trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Columbus
There were no other sightings in Columbus on or around September 27th 2012
